newProject.description: We develop ideas that help improve life in the Czech Republic through IT, have no commercial alternative and are sustainable. Do you have such a project, or are you working on it but lack expert volunteers?
newProject.title: I have project idea

panelVolunteer.description: Developer? Project Manager? Marketer? Projects work best because of the diversity of teams and the sharing of experiences. If you have the desire and the time, whether an hour or ten a week, join in.
panelVolunteer.title: I want to be a volunteer

metadata.description: We are a community of professionals from many fields, ranging from IT to project management and marketing, who want to use their free time to help state institutions and non-governmental organizations to make Czechia a better place to live.
metadata.title: Česko.Digital - Changing Czechia for the better through ones and zeroes

efficiency.perex: We do not waste people’s time or financial resources. We focus on quick solutions to real problems using technology.
efficiency.title: Efficiency

main.perex: In our free time, we are helping non-governmental organizations and state institutions with digital transformation, to make Czechia a better place to live. We want to become a leader in expert volunteering in the areas of innovation and digital technologies in Europe.
main.title: Our Values

openness.perex: We are an open organization - we take pride in open communication and access to information and data. We speak up, with honesty and respect to others. We are not afraid to ask when we don’t know.
openness.title: Openness

participatory.perex: We work in teams and tandems, learning from each other. We seek a way for everybody to get involved, regardless of location or time.
participatory.title: Collaboration

professionalism.perex: We have clearly set and communicated expectations for each other. We act profesionally both within and outside the organization. We are learning from professionals in the community and beyond.
professionalism.title: Professionalism

users.perex: Our solutions are driven by the real needs of end users. Using technology is a means to an end, not the goal itself.
users.title: Usefulness

homepage.subtitle: We are a community of professionals from many fields, ranging from IT to project management and marketing, who want to use their free time to help state institutions and non-governmental organizations to make Czechia a better place to live.
homepage.title: Changing Czechia for the better through ones and zeroes

contribute.note: Do you have any questions? Read
contribute.title: Contribute

projects.description: Thanks to expert volunteering, we can achieve great things and change life in the Czech Republic for the better. See how we do it.
